name: Crescent Turkey Shaped Veggie Platter
author: Pillsbury
summary: Charm your guests at Thanksgiving with this tasty turkey appetizer. Change up the veggies if you like!
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) can Pillsbury® refrigerated crescent dinner rolls or Pillsbury® Crescent Recipe Creations® refrigerated seamless dough sheet
1 (8 ounce) container chive-and-onion cream cheese spread
½ cup spring mix salad greens
½ cup thinly sliced red and yellow bell peppers (1 1/2 inches long)
directions: Remove dough from can; do not unroll
Using serrated knife, cut roll into 20 slices
Place slices, cut side down, on ungreased cookie sheet to form turkey as follows: Place 9 slices in half-circle shape
Place 5 slices below that, then another 3, then 1 in center for head of turkey
Place 2 slices to form feet of turkey, about 1 inch from head; squeeze dough to elongate
Bake 10 to 13 minutes or until golden brown
Cool 1 minute; carefully loosen with pancake turner, and slide onto cooling rack to cool
Spread cream cheese spread over turkey
Top with cucumber slice for head, cauliflower florets, salad greens and sliced bell peppers
Add olive slices for eyes, cut yellow pepper beak and red pepper wattle for turkey
Cover and refrigerate until serving time
To serve, pull apart or cut into pieces
